Keywords: Animal , Arakko , Horsemen
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
THE FIRST CHILDREN: At the beginning of the game, if your starting force has two or more characters with the Horsemen keyword, this game Death has: "Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks." // If a friendly character named Apocalypse, Annihilation, or Genesis is on your force, modify Death's attack and defense +1.
EYE OF DEATH: Smoke Cloud. Smoke Cloud as FREE. // When Death makes a close attack, he may target opposing characters occupying his Smoke Cloud markers, regardless of adjacency.
HORSEMEN OF DEATH: Super Senses, Willpower.

Comments
September 30, 2022
tidge
I'm not as impressed with the OP version of Death as I am the retail version, but I do appreciate that this version has a wildly different set of powers and will inspire a different sort of play style. I have trouble imagining that I'd get 70 (or 75) points of value from this dial in constructed, yet the lower point value (45 or 50) can leverage all the same shenanigans albeit with a slightly lower offensive efficiency. The ability to use the EYE OF DEATH to make close attacks while not actually adjacent (or even within line-of-fire) makes some of the niche offensive Sword objects like Vermilion a reasonable choice, as the effects of some swords depend heavily on specific targets which may be difficult to otherwise target with close attacks.
